hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4H Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC consolidates within a 4-hour Bollinger Band squeeze (BandWidth < 0.1) during a NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the upper band on >1.5x 20-period average volume will lead to a directional move of at least 2.5% in the breakout direction within the next 12 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Bollinger Band squeezes represent periods of low volatility that often precede high-volatility moves. During NEUTRAL regimes, these compressions resolve directionally more reliably than in trending markets. Volume confirmation filters out false breakouts.
entry_conditions: BTC 4H Bollinger BandWidth (20,2) < 0.1 for at least 6 consecutive periods
BTC price closes above upper Bollinger Band (20,2)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Re-entry below middle Bollinger Band (20 SMA)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 12 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout direction fails to sustain >1% move within 6 hours OR more than 40% of breakouts immediately reverse through middle band.
